title: Menendez Inquiry Said to Involve Company That Certifies Halal Meat
description: Federal agents have been asking about IS EG Halal, a New Jersey firm that Egypt made its sole certifier for meat exports from America, an inquiry that appears to include Senator Robert Menendez of New Jersey.
dc:creator: Tracey Tully, Benjamin Weiser and William K. Rashbaum
media:credit: Bryan Anselm for The New York Times
media:description: Senator Robert Menendez said on Friday he stands ready to help prosecutors “when and if they ask.”
